title: Authors and Citation
text: Leccese F (2024). euroleaguer: 'Euroleague basketball API' R Client. R package version 0.1.0, https://flavioleccese92.github.io/euroleaguer/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {euroleaguer: 'Euroleague basketball API' R Client},   author = {Flavio Leccese},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://flavioleccese92.github.io/euroleaguer/}, }

title: Euroleague basketball API R Client
text: euroleaguer provides easy way retrieve data EuroLeague EuroCup API R. Functions allow exploit API methods many purposes, manage Arduino devices dashboards access data produced sensors sketches. un-official API wrapper recommend follow usual rules conduct dealing open API calls.

title: Get game box-score — getGameBoxScore
text: game_code code game. integer value season_code code season (examples "E2023" Euroleague "U2023" Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game box-score — getGameBoxScore
text: Returns list elements chosen games seasons Team. Name teams Coach. Name coaches EndOfQuarter. Team accumulated points quarter ByQuarter. Team points quarter PlayerStats. Statistics player game TeamStats. Aggregated statistics team game Reference webpage: BoxScore

title: Get game box-score — getGameBoxScore
code: getGameBoxScore(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1) #> $Team #> # A tibble: 4 × 3 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Team                               #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>                              #> 1        1 E2023      CRVENA ZVEZDA MERIDIANBET BELGRADE #> 2        1 E2023      LDLC ASVEL VILLEURBANNE            #> 3        1 U2023      PROMETEY SLOBOZHANSKE              #> 4        1 U2023      VEOLIA TOWERS HAMBURG              #>  #> $Coach #> # A tibble: 4 × 3 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Coach             #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>             #> 1        1 E2023      IVANOVIC, DUSKO   #> 2        1 E2023      PARKER, TJ        #> 3        1 U2023      GINZBURG, RONEN   #> 4        1 U2023      BARLOSCHKY, BENKA #>  #> $EndOfQuarter #> # A tibble: 4 × 7 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Team                   Quarter1 Quarter2 Quarter3 Quarter4 #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>                     <int>    <int>    <int>    <int> #> 1        1 E2023      CRVENA ZVEZDA MERIDIA…       29       52       69       94 #> 2        1 E2023      LDLC ASVEL VILLEURBAN…       18       31       55       73 #> 3        1 U2023      PROMETEY SLOBOZHANSKE        35       54       78       97 #> 4        1 U2023      VEOLIA TOWERS HAMBURG        15       42       62       77 #>  #> $ByQuarter #> # A tibble: 4 × 7 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Team                   Quarter1 Quarter2 Quarter3 Quarter4 #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>                     <int>    <int>    <int>    <int> #> 1        1 E2023      CRVENA ZVEZDA MERIDIA…       29       23       17       25 #> 2        1 E2023      LDLC ASVEL VILLEURBAN…       18       13       24       18 #> 3        1 U2023      PROMETEY SLOBOZHANSKE        35       19       24       19 #> 4        1 U2023      VEOLIA TOWERS HAMBURG        15       27       20       15 #>  #> $PlayerStats #> # A tibble: 45 × 31 #>    GameCode SeasonCode Player_ID IsStarter IsPlaying TeamCode Player     Seconds #>       <dbl> <chr>      <chr>         <int>     <int> <chr>    <chr>        <dbl> #>  1        1 E2023      004720            0         1 RED      STEFAN LA…     304 #>  2        1 E2023      JDR               0         1 RED      MILOS TEO…     877 #>  3        1 E2023      005099            0         1 RED      ADAM HANG…    1341 #>  4        1 E2023      002553            0         1 RED      LUKA MITR…    1292 #>  5        1 E2023      LUO               1         0 RED      BRANKO LA…     766 #>  6        1 E2023      012711            1         0 RED      MARKO SIM…    1102 #>  7        1 E2023      011224            1         0 RED      SHABAZZ N…    1240 #>  8        1 E2023      008966            0         0 RED      MIKE TOBE…     784 #>  9        1 E2023      011964            0         1 RED      DALIBOR I…     873 #> 10        1 E2023      000848            0         0 RED      NEMANJA N…    1017 #> # title: Get game header — getGameHeader
text: game_code code game. integer value season_code code season (examples "E2023" Euroleague "U2023" Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game header — getGameHeader
code: getGameHeader(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1) #> # A tibble: 2 × 46 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Live  Round Date       Hour   Stadium Capacity TeamA TeamB #>      <dbl> <chr>      <lgl> <chr> <chr>      <chr>  <chr>   <chr>    <chr> <chr> #> 1        1 E2023      FALSE 1     05/10/2023 "19:0… STARK … 18360    CRVE… LDLC… #> 2        1 U2023      FALSE 1     04/10/2023 "18:0… ARENA … 2022     PROM… VEOL… #> # ℹ 36 more variables: CodeTeamA <chr>, TVCodeA <chr>, CodeTeamB <chr>, #> #   TVCodeB <chr>, ImA <chr>, ImB <chr>, ScoreA <chr>, ScoreB <chr>, #> #   CoachA <chr>, CoachB <chr>, GameTime <chr>, RemainingPartialTime <chr>, #> #   Wid <chr>, Quarter <chr>, FoultsA <chr>, FoultsB <chr>, TimeoutsA <chr>, #> #   TimeoutsB <chr>, ScoreQuarter1A <int>, ScoreQuarter2A <int>, #> #   ScoreQuarter3A <int>, ScoreQuarter4A <int>, ScoreExtraTimeA <int>, #> #   ScoreQuarter1B <int>, ScoreQuarter2B <int>, ScoreQuarter3B <int>, …

title: Get game players — getGamePlayers
text: game_code code game. integer value team_code code team (examples "ASV", "MAD", ...) season_code code season (examples "E2023" Euroleague "U2023" Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game players — getGamePlayers
text: Returns tibble players related information given game season

title: Get game players — getGamePlayers
code: getGamePlayers(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), team_code = "ASV", game_code = 1) #> # A tibble: 14 × 12 #>    GameCode TeamCode SeasonCode C     Ac     Na    Nu       St    Sl    Nn P     #>       <dbl> <chr>    <chr>      <chr> <chr>  <chr> <chr> <int> <int> <int> <chr> #>  1        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0127… SCOT… 00        0     1     1 Forw… #>  2        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0112… LEE,… 3         1     1     1 Guard #>  3        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   PKIR   KAHU… 5         0     0     0 Forw… #>  4        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0041… LAUV… 7         1     1     1 Cent… #>  5        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0120… LUWA… 9         1     1     1 Forw… #>  6        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0032… DALL… 10        0     1     0 Forw… #>  7        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0002… JACK… 11        0     1     0 Forw… #>  8        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0021… DE C… 12        1     1     1 Guard #>  9        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0127… EGBU… 15        1     1     1 Cent… #> 10        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0065… FALL… 19        0     1     1 Cent… #> 11        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0035… LIGH… 23        0     0     0 Forw… #> 12        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0127… NDIA… 24        0     1     1 Cent… #> 13        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0113… NOAM… 31        0     1     1 Guard #> 14        1 ASV      E2023      ASV   P0127… JACK… 33        0     1     1 Guard #> # ℹ 1 more variable: Im <chr>

title: Get game points — getGamePoints
text: game_code code game. integer value season_code code season (examples "E2023" Euroleague "U2023" Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game points — getGamePoints
text: Returns scoring information player chosen games seasons (subset play--play data). particular: NumAnot. Reference id action (useful join retult getPlayByPlay) CoordX CoordY. Spatial coordinates shot Zone. Area court shot Reference webpage: PlayByPlay

title: Get game points — getGamePoints
code: getGamePoints(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1) #> # A tibble: 311 × 20 #>    GameCode SeasonCode TeamCode NumAnot Player_ID Player Action_ID Action Points #>       <dbl> <chr>      <chr>      <int> <chr>     <chr>  <chr>     <chr>   <int> #>  1        1 E2023      ASV            4 004194    LAUVE… 3FGA      Misse…      0 #>  2        1 E2023      ASV            6 004194    LAUVE… 2FGM      Two P…      2 #>  3        1 E2023      RED            7 LUO       LAZIC… 3FGM      Three…      3 #>  4        1 E2023      ASV           10 004194    LAUVE… 2FGM      Two P…      2 #>  5        1 E2023      RED           11 012711    SIMON… 3FGM      Three…      3 #>  6        1 E2023      ASV           14 012080    LUWAW… 3FGA      Misse…      0 #>  7        1 E2023      RED           18 011224    NAPIE… 3FGM      Three…      3 #>  8        1 E2023      ASV           19 012080    LUWAW… 2FGM      Two P…      2 #>  9        1 E2023      RED           21 012711    SIMON… 3FGM      Three…      3 #> 10        1 E2023      RED           26 006436    GIEDR… 2FGM      Two P…      2 #> # ℹ 301 more rows #> # ℹ 11 more variables: CoordX <int>, CoordY <int>, Zone <chr>, Fastbreak <chr>, #> #   SecondChance <chr>, PointsOffTurnover <chr>, Minute <int>, Console <chr>, #> #   PointsA <int>, PointsB <int>, Utc <dttm>

title: Get game round — getGameRound
text: game_code code game. integer value season_code code season (examples "E2023" Euroleague "U2023" Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game round — getGameRound
text: Returns round value given game season

title: Get game round — getGameRound
code: getGameRound(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1) #> # A tibble: 2 × 3 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Value   #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>   #> 1        1 E2023      ROUND 1 #> 2        1 U2023      ROUND 1
